languages.text: "Странные?.. Один из инфернусов был уличен в отсутствии пропуска в помещение, где расположен {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} логирования работ. Утрата пропуска — серьезное нарушение, но мерзавец говорит, что у него его отобрал какой-то блюститель. Указать имя и звание блюстителя задержанный не смог, по описанию — мужчина, светловолосый, высокий... Но он же явно брешет, Ваша Светлость! Потерял он его, пропил или продал!"

"Outlandish ones? One of the inferni was found to be missing his pass to the room housing the work log {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. Losing such a pass is a serious offence, but the scoundrel claims an enforcer took it from him. He could not specify the name and rank of the enforcer, but he did give a description: a man, tall, blond hair... Obviously, he is lying. He either lost it or sold it for a bottle of rotgut!"
languages.original_text: "Странные?.. Один из инфернусов был уличен в отсутствии пропуска в помещение, где расположен {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} логирования работ. Утрата пропуска — серьезное нарушение, но мерзавец говорит, что у него его отобрал какой-то блюститель. Указать имя и звание блюстителя задержанный не смог, по описанию — мужчина, светловолосый, высокий... Но он же явно брешет, Ваша Светлость! Потерял он его, пропил или продал!"

traits.locale_text: "Outlandish ones?.. One of the Inferni has been discovered to be missing a pass to the chamber where the work logging cogitator is located. Losing a pass is a serious offense, but the bastard says an enforcer took it from him. The detainee could not specify the name and rank of the enforcer, but he described him as a blond and tall man... But he is lying, obviously. He either lost it or sold it for booze, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «¿Estrambóticas? Uno de los inferni ha perdido su pase a la sala del {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} de registros laborales. Perder un pase tan importante es una infracción grave, pero el muy granuja asegura que se lo quitó un guardia. No supo concretar su nombre ni su rango, pero sí nos facilitó una descripción: fue un hombre alto y rubio... Es evidente que miente. ¡Seguro que lo perdió o lo cambió por una botella de aguardiente!».
languages.original_text: "Outlandish ones? One of the inferni was found to be missing his pass to the room housing the work log {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. Losing such a pass is a serious offence, but the scoundrel claims an enforcer took it from him. He could not specify the name and rank of the enforcer, but he did give a description: a man, tall, blond hair... Obviously, he is lying. He either lost it or sold it for a bottle of rotgut!"

Perder un pase tan importante es una infracción grave, pero el muy granuja asegura que se lo quitó un guardia. No supo concretar su nombre ni su rango, pero sí nos facilitó una descripción: fue un hombre alto y rubio... Es evidente que miente. ¡Seguro que lo perdió o lo cambió por una botella de aguardiente!».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « Farfelues ? L'un des inferni n'avait pas son laissez-passer pour la salle du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} des registres du personnel. Perdre ce laissez-passer est déjà un délit en soi, mais cette vermine a prétendu que c'était un prévôt qui le lui avait pris. Il n'a pu nous donner ni son nom ni son grade. Non, tout ce qu'il a pu nous dire à son sujet, c'est que c'était un grand blond... Il est évident qu'il ment. Soit il l'a perdu, soit il l'a vendu contre une bouteille de tord-boyaux ! »
languages.original_text: "Outlandish ones? One of the inferni was found to be missing his pass to the room housing the work log {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. Losing such a pass is a serious offence, but the scoundrel claims an enforcer took it from him. He could not specify the name and rank of the enforcer, but he did give a description: a man, tall, blond hair... Obviously, he is lying. He either lost it or sold it for a bottle of rotgut!"

traits.locale_text: « Farfelues ? L'un des inferni n'avait pas son laissez-passer pour la salle du cogitateur des registres du personnel. Perdre ce laissez-passer est déjà un délit en soi, mais cette vermine a prétendu que c'était un prévôt qui le lui avait pris. Il n'a pu nous donner ni son nom ni son grade. Non, tout ce qu'il a pu nous dire à son sujet, c'est que c'était un grand blond... Il est évident qu'il ment. Soit il l'a perdu, soit il l'a vendu contre une bouteille de tord-boyaux ! »

languages.text: “荒诞不经吗？我们发现，控火行会的其中一名成员弄丢了通行证，那张通行证可以打开工作日志{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}的房间大门。丢失通行证是很严重的罪行，但那个人渣却声称是某个执法者从他这里拿走了通行证。他没办法说出那名执法者的姓名与军衔，只是描述了一下那个人的长相：那是个男人，高个子，一头金发……很显然，他是在说谎。要么是他自己弄丢的，要么是用通行证换了一瓶私酒！”
languages.original_text: "Outlandish ones? One of the inferni was found to be missing his pass to the room housing the work log {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. Losing such a pass is a serious offence, but the scoundrel claims an enforcer took it from him. He could not specify the name and rank of the enforcer, but he did give a description: a man, tall, blond hair... Obviously, he is lying. He either lost it or sold it for a bottle of rotgut!"

traits.locale_text: “荒诞不经吗？我们发现，控火行会的其中一名成员弄丢了通行证，那张通行证可以打开工作日志{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}的房间大门。丢失通行证是很严重的罪行，但那个人渣却声称是某个执法者从他这里拿走了通行证。他没办法说出那名执法者的姓名与军衔，只是描述了一下那个人的长相：那是个男人，高个子，一头金发……很显然，他是在说谎。要么是他自己弄丢的，要么是用通行证换了一瓶私酒！”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「突拍子もないものですか？インフェルニの一人が、作業ログ{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}がある部屋へのパスを紛失したことが判明しました。このようなパスの紛失は重大な犯罪ですが、あの悪党は、エンフォーサーに奪われたと主張しているのです。奴は、そのエンフォーサーの名前や階級を明言することはできませんでしたが、背が高く、金髪の男だったと説明しました。明らかに嘘ですね。紛失したのか、もしくは安酒1本のために売り払ったのでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Outlandish ones? One of the inferni was found to be missing his pass to the room housing the work log {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. Losing such a pass is a serious offence, but the scoundrel claims an enforcer took it from him. He could not specify the name and rank of the enforcer, but he did give a description: a man, tall, blond hair... Obviously, he is lying. He either lost it or sold it for a bottle of rotgut!"

traits.locale_text: 「突拍子もないものですか？インフェルニの一人が、作業ログ{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}がある部屋へのパスを紛失したことが判明しました。このようなパスの紛失は重大な犯罪ですが、あの悪党は、エンフォーサーに奪われたと主張しているのです。奴は、そのエンフォーサーの名前や階級を明言することはできませんでしたが、背が高く、金髪の男だったと説明しました。明らかに嘘ですね。紛失したのか、もしくは安酒1本のために売り払ったのでしょう！」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Befremdlich? Einer der Inferni, vermisste seinen Pass für den Raum, in dem der Arbeitsprotokoll-{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} untergebracht ist. Der Verlust eines solchen Passes ist ein schweres Vergehen, aber er behauptet, ein Enforcer hätte ihn ihm weggenommen. Er wusste weder Name noch Rang des Enforcers, aber er konnte ihn beschreiben: männlich, groß, blondes Haar ... Er lügt ganz offensichtlich. Er hat ihn entweder verloren oder für eine Flasche Fusel verkauft."
languages.original_text: "Outlandish ones? One of the inferni was found to be missing his pass to the room housing the work log {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. languages.text: "En tuhaf olanlar mı? İtfacılardan birinin çalışma kaydı {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarını{/g} barındıran odaya giriş kartını kaybettiği ortaya çıktı. Böyle bir giriş kartını kaybetmek, ciddi bir suçtur. Ancak alçak herif, bir infazcının kartı kendisinden aldığını iddia etti. İnfazcının açıkça ne ismini ne de rütbesini söyledi ama tipini anlattı: Bir erkek, uzun boylu ve sarı saçlı... Yalan söylediği aşikâr. Kartı ya kaybetti ya da bir şişe groksöldüren için sattı!"
languages.original_text: "Outlandish ones? One of the inferni was found to be missing his pass to the room housing the work log {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. Losing such a pass is a serious offence, but the scoundrel claims an enforcer took it from him. He could not specify the name and rank of the enforcer, but he did give a description: a man, tall, blond hair... Obviously, he is lying. He either lost it or sold it for a bottle of rotgut!"
